column4: Ubuntu left grub broken when I installed over it can anyone help me fix
Anyone?
What happened? Give details, please.
I need to reinstall grub from ubuntu live disk
I havent been able to cause its lvm
what actually happened to your Grub install?
I installed a different distro over it and now I cant boot my windows or linux, give error 13 or 15
there an easy way to install grub with live cd?
if you mount the boot directory and look in Grub, do you see any of your old files? I know on my box, Ubuntu simply wrote new files in addendum to the existing ones.
cant mount it
dunno why
we tried alot of stuff last night and concluded i needed to reinstall grub
mount dev dir??
when you run 'df -m' do you see the partition with /boot on the list?
do you just know how to reinstall it?
can we talk in pm to I can just use /EXEC -o
I don't think I can msg on this server. I believe it requires registration.
you can unless they changed it
can you just tell me if there is a command to install grub autimatically with ubuntu live dapper
it's not working. I can read you but you can't read me.
Cause we tried chroot last night and couldnt manually reinstall it I think there is a way to do this easily
go to #linuxputz
